title: Deadlock
subtext: A stand-off where processes block each other's progress
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Deadlock
texts: Deadlock is a situation in computing where two or more processes are each waiting for the other to release a resource, causing all of them to remain blocked.
Imagine deadlock as a stand-off in a narrow hallway where two people block each other's way and neither can move forward until one steps aside.
